languages.text: Kills made by the wearer grant additional (killed target difficulty tier x 2) momentum

languages.text: When the wearer kills an enemy, {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} is additionally increased by twice the target's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g}.

languages.text: 着用者が敵を殺すと、{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}が対象の{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}脅威度{/g}の2倍分、追加で増加する。

languages.text: Когда персонаж убивает противника, {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментум{/g} дополнительно увеличивается на значение, равное удвоенному {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}рангу{/g} цели.

languages.text: Tötet der Träger einen Gegner, wird außerdem die {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} um die zweifachen {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsstufe{/g} des Ziels erhöht.

languages.text: Takan kişi bir düşmanı öldürdüğünde {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, ilaveten hedefin {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}zorluk derecesinin{/g} iki katı daha artar.

languages.text: Lorsque le porteur tue un adversaire, son gain de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g} est augmenté à hauteur du double du {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté{/g} de la cible.

languages.text: Cuando el usuario mata a un enemigo, su {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} recibe un incremento adicional equivalente al doble del {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}nivel de desafío{/g} del objetivo.

languages.text: 装备者击杀敌人时获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}，等同于目标{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}的两倍。
